Kisum

Height:
5'5" (165 cm)

Introduction

Kisum is a South Korean rapper under RND Company, who debuted in 2013 as part of a duo with Se.A. She gained fame in 2015 when she joined the first season of Unpretty Rapstar, a reality show for female rappers. She reached the semi-finals before being eliminated from the competition.

After leaving her former agency Mapps Entertainment (November 15, 2019), she signed with FirstOne Entertainment on December 9, 2019. On January 9, 2023, she moved to R&D Company.
